extendedInfo.description: ââââââââââââââââââââââCurrently on Sale! 50% Off, Don't miss it! ââââââââââââââââââââââWhat is High Blood Pressure?============================High Blood Pressure, also known as hypertension, is when the heart has to work harder to get blood to the body. High blood pressure is a risk factor for a variety of serious diseases including coronary disease, stroke, hardening of the arteries, and atherosclerosis. it is thought to be one of the most important and preventable causes of premature death in developed countries.Your diet can directly affect your blood pressure level. Following a heart-healthy diet to help maintain a normal blood pressure level should be a key component of your high blood pressure treatment plan.ABOUT THIS APP==================================High Blood Pressure Recipes & Food is an application containing 700 recipes suitable for people with high blood pressure problems. These recipes are divided into different categories including: Appetizer, Bread, Breakfast, Main Course, Desserts etc...The recipes are very detailed and it contains step-by-step instructions, as well as the ingredients and the portion. It also contains the nutrition facts of each item and their corresponding % daily values. The application is optimized for all Android devices running on OS 1.5 or above.âââââââââââââââââââââââWHAT YOU WILL EXPECT This application has the following features:- 2-Level Category Views with THUMBNAIL preview of each recipe- All Category View to preview all recipes in alphabetical order- Single Category View to list recipes of the same category- Ability to BOOKMARK selected recipes for easier reference- A recipe name SEARCH engine- OFFLINE browsingââââââââââââââââââââââThis application is proudly presented by ColaKey LLC.

reviews.title: Does exactly what it says
reviews.comment: You can bookmark your favorites and every meal provides the nutritional facts per serving! So I know how much sodium I\'m feeding my family and the step by step directions are easy to follow. Hoping to see more meals added :)
reviews.author: A Google User
